mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.board_id, c.content, c.posted_date, u.user_id, u.nickname, u.user_img, ROUND(COALESCE(SUM(r.distance), 0), 2) AS userDist, CONCAT( FLOOR(SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, r.startTime, r.endTime)) / SUM(r.distance) / 60), "'", LPAD(MOD(SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, r.startTime, r.endTime)) / SUM(r.distance), 60), 2, '0'), "''" ) AS userPace FROM Comment c JOIN User u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN Record r ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.board_id = #{boardId} GROUP BY c.comment_id, u.user_id, u.user_img
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Comment (board_id, content, posted_date, user_id) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{content}, NOW(), #{userId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Comment WHERE comment_id = #{commentId} AND user_id = #{userId}
